首里城再建、菅長官「財政面含め全面的に支援」…沖縄知事と会談

01 Nov 2019, 13:05

　菅官房長官は１日、沖縄県の玉城デニー知事と首相官邸で会談し、焼失した首里城の再建に全力を挙げることで一致した。菅氏は再建計画について「財政的な措置を含めて、全面的に支援していきたい」と述べた。
　菅氏は会談に先立つ記者会見で、再建に向けた関係省庁による対策チームを作る方針を示した。
　玉城氏は会談後、記者団に「首里城は県民の心のよりどころだ。できるだけ前倒しで計画を策定して、発表したい」と述べた。

Reconstruction of Shuri Castle, Secretary of the Secretary “Full support including financial aspects” ... Meeting with the governor of Okinawa

01 Nov 2019, 13:05

”Secretary of the Secretary of the Secretariat met with Governor Denney of Okinawa Prefecture on May 1 at the prime minister's official residence, and agreed to make every effort to rebuild Shuri Castle. Mr. Tsuji stated that he would like to provide full support for the reconstruction plan, including financial measures.
菅 At a press conference prior to the meeting, Mr. Tsuji showed the policy of creating a countermeasure team by the relevant ministries and agencies for reconstruction.
Mr. Tamaki told reporters after the meeting, “Shurijo is the heart of the citizens of the prefecture. We want to make a plan ahead of schedule and make an announcement”.
